Articles.Content:
Scenario: I’m warping forward a year or two for a transfer window. I see it coming up and hit . a few times to slow down. I overshoot because the transition from max warp to 1x is smoothed out rather than instant.

I think here the UI should respond instantly rather than gradually, at least when slowing down timewarp; speeding it up could still have the smoothed transition.

4 minutes ago, Periple said:

speeding it up could still have the smoothed transition.

I'd prefer it work both ways for the sake of consistency, and it could be an option as well.
I don't remember, is it also gradual if you click the warp bar section to jump to 1x directly?

"Warp to transfer window"

KAC had it a decade ago KSP2 can probably get it now.
